parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the Uconnect system can cause the backup camera to malfunction, leading to a hazardous driving situation.
symptoms: The Uconnect screen goes black and becomes unresponsive
requiring soft and hard resets to restore functionality. The system may eventually restore itself after several hours.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loud Popping Sound and Backup Camera Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loud popping sound can be distracting and alarming, while the malfunctioning backup camera can cause a hazardous driving situation.
symptoms: A loud popping sound occurs when starting the car
and the backup camera screen remains on after shifting out of reverse gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to accelerate properly can lead to accidents, while the transmission issues can cause the vehicle to become stuck in gear.
symptoms: or gets stuck in reverse gear. The "D" for drive may flash on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Key Fob Battery Drain and Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the key fob can prevent the vehicle from starting, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The key fob battery drains quickly
and replacing the battery does not resolve the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning rear view camera can cause a hazardous driving situation, especially at night.
symptoms: The rear view camera is dark and cloudy
making it difficult to see. The camera may also remain on after shifting out of reverse gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning windows can drain the vehicle's battery, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The driver and passenger windows move up and down when the car is parked overnight

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning wheel can cause a loss of control, while the camera issue can cause a hazardous driving situation.
symptoms: The front left wheel makes a thumping sound when turning
and the rear view camera remains on after shifting out of reverse gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The multiple safety concerns can cause a hazardous driving situation and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The backup camera is unavailable when reversing
and the passenger door lock has difficulty locking and unlocking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission and steering issues can cause a loss of control and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle jolts backward when reversing
the gears become stuck in park
and the steering wheel is hard to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering or rack and pinion can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering cuts in and out around corners
the steering wheel gets stuck in a notch
the vehicle is difficult to control
and there may be an unstable feeling in steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lower Control Arm and Ball Joint Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower control arm and ball joint can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The lower control arm and ball joint break
causing the vehicle to lose control
and potentially leading to accidents or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire issues can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: and incorrect tire sizes can lead to loss of control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission issues can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle is hesitant to take off
even when the accelerator is to the floor
and there may be incorrect gear shifting ratios.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve system can cause the engine to shut off while driving, leading to a loss of power steering and braking, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: loss of power steering and braking

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to pop out of gear, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-misses.
The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to shift randomly, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-misses.
The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to get stuck in gear, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-misses.
symptoms: problems shifting into lower gears when cold

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to stop in the middle of traffic, leading to accidents or near-misses.
